titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to make technical corrections to the new border tunnels and passages offense.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
7/23/2007--Introduced.
Amends the federal criminal code to assign a new section number (555 instead of 554) to the provision prohibiting the construction of border tunnels and passages into the United States.
